original_text: “There is dirt from your town on our feet. We will clean it off to show that you have not accepted us. God is not happy with you. But listen! You should know that the kingdom of God has come very near.”
korean_text: 너희 동네에서 우리 발에 묻은 먼지도 너희에게 떨어버리노라 그러나 하나님의 나라가 가까이 온 줄을 알라 하라

sentences.original_text: There is dirt from your town on our feet.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 발에 당신 동네의 흙이 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: to show that you have not accepted us.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 우리를 받아들이지 않았음을 보여주기 위해

sentences.original_text: God is not happy with you.
that the kingdom of God has come very near.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 나라가 매우 가까이 왔다는 것을
